testsuite.name: PlayerRaidDungeonComponentTests

testcase.name: initializationError

failure.message: org.apache.ibatis.exceptions.PersistenceException: ### Error building SqlSession. ### The error may exist in SQL Mapper Configuration ### Cause: org.apache.ibatis.builder.BuilderException: Error parsing SQL Mapper Configuration. Cause: com.zaxxer.hikari.pool.HikariPool$PoolInitializationException: Failed to initialize pool: Communications link failure
